posts.title: Beeline Bicycle Smart Navigation Device
posts.content: Weave through the streets without getting lost by outfitting your bike with the bicycle smart navigation device. It mounts directly onto the handlebar and strips down navigation to its basics by simply pointing you in the general direction of your destination.

posts.title: Cat Cave Bed
posts.content: All kitties like lurking in the shadows – so keep your feline friend protected and happy by buying him a cat cave bed. Handmade from felted New Zealand wool, each bed has a truly unique look and shape to match your special fluffball.

posts.title: Sleep Tracking System
posts.content: Experience a night of sleep unlike no other when you begin using the sleep tracking system while slumbering. This little device stands beside you while you rest and emits a series of lights and sounds designed to improve transitions in and out of sleep.

posts.title: Grocery Shopping Checklist
posts.content: Ensure you don’t forget a single item the next time you hit your local supermarket by bringing along this grocery shopping checklist. Each 9″ x 6″ sheet of paper is separated into various categories and set up as a simple checklist where you mark off what you need.

posts.title: Giant Gummy Hamburger
posts.content: This giant gummy hamburger will make the perfect dessert for your next fast food feast. Modeled after the iconic fast food staple, this sugary 7 ounce burger comes with two buns and a nice and chewy gummy patty topped off with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

posts.title: Mooning Garden Gnome
posts.content: If you’ve grown tired of the garden variety lawn ornaments, the mooning garden gnome is just what you need to spruce up the yard. This little stinker may be an outcast among his fellow gnomes, but he’s exactly what you’ve been looking for to piss off the neighborhood.

posts.title: Car Windshield Frost Cover
posts.content: Avoid having a sheet of ice spawn over your ride overnight by using this car windshield frost cover. It comes with tough elastic straps so that you can safely secure it to your vehicle, and it’s made from a sturdy water resistant material.

posts.title: Two Person Umbrella
posts.content: Your romantic night doesn’t have to come to an end just because of a little rain – the two person umbrella will allow you and your date to stay dry while also facilitating you to get in each others comfort zone… making the two person umbrella the ultimate wingman.

posts.title: Smartphone Synced Mood Light
posts.content: Alter the room’s appearance with the tip of your finger using this smartphone synced mood light. Apart from providing you with dozens of vibrant colors to choose from, it can be programmed to alert you to incoming calls or pulse to the rhythm of your favorite song.

posts.title: Spy Secrets That Can Save Your Life
posts.content: Ensure you always have the upper hand by reading the Spy Secrets That Can Save Your Life book. Former CIA operative Jason Hanson reveals helpful tricks like how to improvise self defense weapons and how to hone your positive awareness.

posts.title: Yoga Learning Mat
posts.content: Ditch the overcrowded classes and become a skilled yogi from the comfort of home using the yoga learning mat. This natural rubber mat comes with a ten-session DVD and numbered circles printed onto the surface of the mat that show proper hand and foot placement.

posts.title: Dinosaur Sandwich Cutter
posts.content: Become a true sandwich artist and go prehistoric with your sandwich shaping with the dinosaur sandwich cutter. This fun tool is perfect for molding your peanut butter and jelly sandwiches into cute and delicious dinos that your children will love.
